overview:
Ben is renowned throughout mobile advertising and content industries as one of the most inspiring and creative minds. Over the last 10 years, Ben has worked on a range of accounts for some of the largest brands, enabling them to interact directly with millions of consumers globally. Following his success in pioneering the mobile content business with Zed, Ben subsequently spent three years at O2 driving content and advertising revenues across O2’s media channels. He has championed several award winning campaigns and products, including Winner, Best Interactive Viral, Channel 4 Germs Awards - April 07, Finalist, International Independent Gaming Awards - Dec 07 and Runner up, Mobile Pitch, Golden Joy Stick Awards - Oct 07.

Ben has an incredible understanding of the media mix and an in-depth knowledge of digital and mobile technologies. A fluent communicator, Benâ€™s extensive hands-on industry experience brings a wealth of knowledge to the group.
